channel.title: Only loginbox
channel.description:
how can i delete the screen on my client right before you log in
EDIT: i tryed something and i got it deleted but if i type you can't see what i am typing and if you click on the place where you should have to enter the login page and then you type something then you click on return then you see what you typed
here a video to make it easier to understand http://www.screencast.com/t/VDalRn5t70
